caption.p: Northern Hemisphere September sea-ice extent anomalies from observation (black line) as well as 40 members of CESM-LE (gray lines). The sea-ice extent is defined as the total area of grid cells with sea ice concentration greater than 15%. The anomaly is defined as the deviation from the 1981â€“2010 climatology. ( a) The raw time series. ( b) Same as ( a) except being highpass-filtered with a cutoff period of 9 years.
